mapper.sql: id, partner_id, user_id, service_type_id, response_time, province_id, city_id, region_id, add_time
mapper.select:
select
from partner_users where 1=1
and partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
and service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
and user_id in (select id from users where name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) )
and user_id in (select id from users where mobile like CONCAT('%','${mobile}','%' ) )
order by add_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into partner_users (id, partner_id, user_id, service_type_id, response_time, province_id, city_id, region_id, add_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{partnerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{responseTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cityId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regionId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

id,
partner_id,
user_id,

response_time,
province_id,
city_id,

add_time,

update partner_users
partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
